full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SRAD RGYUD LUGS KYI RI KHROD LO MA GYON MA'I SGRUB THABS DANG BU MCHOG BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES RI KHROD LO MA CAN MA'I SGRUB THABS DANG BUM BSKYED BCAS SRAD RGYUD RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GSUNG BZHIN GRUB DBANG DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSOS SDEB PA LTAR BKOD PA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, DRAG PO'I RIMS NAD 'JOMS MDZAD LO GYON MA'I, ,SGRUB THABS LAS RIM PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGES, ,BSTAN DANG DE 'DZIN DAR RGYAS YUN GNAS SHING, ,'GRO KUN RTAG TU NAD MED BDE LEGS SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,PAR 'DI BSTAN GLING PAR KHANG DU BZHUGS SO,, ,,)
